Metadata.name: Persona 3 The Movie Portraits
Metadata.author: wxnder
Metadata.description:
Replaces the party portraits used during dungeon exploration with character artwork from the Persona 3 anime movies.
Disable HQ Party Portraits if you would like to use the P3 movie portraits at all times.
If you use this mod and HQ Party Portraits together, the default character portraits will display during dungeon exploration and the P3 movie portraits will display during battle.
